code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import Button from'../../../UtilityComponents/SimpleUtilityComponents/Button/Button';import{getImage}from'../../../Utils/UtilsGeneral';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ReciepeImage({image,setImage}){const fileInputRef=useRef(0);const handleImageChange=async event=>{const base64=await getImage(event.target.files[0]);setImage(base64);};const addImage=async()=>{fileInputRef.current.click();};return _jsxs("div",{className:"reciepe_body_container",children:[_jsx("input",{style:{display:'none'},type:"file",accept:"image/*",onChange:handleImageChange,ref:fileInputRef}),_jsx(Button,{name:'add image',handleFunction:addImage,buttonStyle:'reciepe_button',containerStyle:'reciepe_image_button'}),_jsx("div",{className:"reciepe_image_container",children:_jsx("img",{src:image.value===''?require('../../../Assets/images/null.jpg'):image.value,alt:"",className:"reciepe_image"})})]});}export default ReciepeImage;
